title: I need help with LoL resolution
body: I have this problem with league, where when i try to load into a match then, my monitor says "out of range" then goes into a black screen, from what i have read i need to change the resolution out side of the game, people say go to  the file League of Legends > game > DATA > CFG > game.cfg but i cant find it :/ i'm not familiar with windows 10 and i would appreciate if someone could help me with this. :)

replies.body:
If our resolution issue is losing signal and is too large, then you can try resetting your configuration outside of game to return to default:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hopefully that does the trick!
